DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether ranolazine will reduce the risk of arrhythmic events in patients with long QT syndrome type 3.
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Prophylactic Therapy of Congenital Long QT Syndrome Type III (LQT3) With Ranolazine
DOC.criteria: Long QT patients with genetic confirmation of carrierstatus for the D1790G mutation in the SCN5A gene Corrected QT interval > 460 msec Need for therapy with medications that are potent or moderately potent CYP3A inhibitors (such as ketoconazole, diltiazem, verapamil, macrolide antibiotics or HIV protease inhibitors)
